string-array.name: demo_card_1
string-array.item: Circular menu with position gravity set to bottom right
Click a menu item to show the circular Progressbar.
The menu is using default animation parameters.
See the CircularMenu in demo_card1.xml for more info.

string-array.name: demo_card_2
string-array.item: Showing a Circular menu with position gravity set to center
Click a menu item to show the Long Path Progressbar with a colors array defined.
The menu is using a custom overshoot animation with 1300ms duration.
The adapter of the menu uses different colors.
See the CircularMenu in demo_card2.xml for more info.

string-array.name: demo_card_3
string-array.item: Directional menu with position gravity set to bottom right and layout direction to horizontal
Click a menu item to show the jumping dot Progressbar with a colors array defined.
The menu is using a custom overshoot animation with a delay between each menu item.
See the CircularMenu in demo_card3.xml for more info.

string-array.name: demo_card_4
string-array.item: Directional menu with position gravity set to top left and layout direction to vertical
Click a menu item to show the blob Progressbar.
The menu is using default animation parameters.
See the CircularMenu in demo_card4.xml for more info.
